query:
SELECT gl.gestorId, COUNT(*) as count,
       (SELECT u.name FROM gestores g JOIN users u ON g.userId = u.id WHERE g.id = gl.gestorId) as gestor_nome
FROM gestor_lojas gl
GROUP BY gl.gestorId
ORDER BY gl.gestorId
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2rEtBRZHWZUfGJS.3b07a01772f8 --database 3c9MozLH35e233uWy5WDtH --execute SELECT gl.gestorId, COUNT(*) as count,
       (SELECT u.name FROM gestores g JOIN users u ON g.userId = u.id WHERE g.id = gl.gestorId) as gestor_nome

GROUP BY gl.gestorId
ORDER BY gl.gestorId
